issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Reverse geocode was returning a result that was compatible with Address in the contacts module. The reverseGeocoder test in KS expects the raw keys. Add street, country_code, address to the result. In an Address, street maps to street1, country_code to countryCode, and address to displayAddress.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Reverse GeoCode result needs raw values

comments.body:
{html}

(from [3668c395a5251a4ea19ad1581349b9d043a4974c]) [#699 state:resolved] added 'raw' keys to address result http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/3668c395a5251...

{html}
